title: Hydroponics Growing System, 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Height Adjustable Indoor Gardening System, Hydroponic Growing System Built-in Timer Function
descriptions: Experience the future of indoor gardening with our Hydroponics Growing System, featuring 12 pods for ultimate plant growth. Equipped with an advanced SMD LED Grow Light that provides full-spectrum lighting and accelerates growth by 5 times, this system is designed to help your plants thrive like never before. The water circulation system ensures fresh and clean water every 30 minutes, while the 4L water tank allows for self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days. With an adjustable height of up to 17.78 inches and a built-in timer function, this system is perfect for all plant types. Plus, enjoy peace of mind with a 360-day warranty and available after-sales service. Elevate your indoor gardening game with our Hydroponics Growing System today!

Experience the future of indoor gardening with our Hydroponics Growing System, featuring 12 Pods for maximum plant capacity. This innovative system comes equipped with a powerful 25W SMD LED Grow Light that provides a full-spectrum of light, accelerating plant growth by 5 times compared to traditional lights. 

With an Advanced Deep Flow water circulation system that runs every 30 minutes, your plants will receive the perfect amount of water without any hassle. The 4L water tank allows for self-sufficient growth for up to 18 days, giving you peace of mind while you watch your garden flourish.

Adjust the height of the system up to 17.78 inches to accommodate different plant sizes, and let the built-in timer function take care of the rest. The package includes everything you need to get started, from plant food to biochar mud, ensuring a successful growing experience.

Backed by a 360-day warranty and available after-sales support, our Hydroponics Growing System is the ultimate solution for indoor gardening enthusiasts. Don't miss out on the opportunity to transform your space into a thriving garden oasis. Order yours today!
